item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AMD's Turin: 5th Gen EPYC Launched (90 points | 23 comments)
2. Started a guide to writing FUSE filesystems in Python (171 points | 43 comments)
3. Lm.rs: Minimal CPU LLM inference in Rust with no dependency (217 points | 50 comments)

5. Are retrocomputers best left on or off? (25 points | 15 comments)
6. Show HN: I made a URL expander because short links are too mainstream (113 points | 56 comments)
7. "Bad Apple" in Minecraft (234 points | 30 comments)

23. How long til we're all on Ozempic? (303 points | 1110 comments)

25. Grokking at the edge of linear separability (76 points | 20 comments)
26. In SSRI withdrawal, brain zaps go from overlooked symptom to center stage (2023) (105 points | 109 comments)
27. Hamming AI (YC S24) Is Hiring a Product Engineer ( | hide)
28. A Lisp compiler to RISC-V written in Lisp (227 points | 43 comments)
29. Gleam: A Basic Introduction (86 points | 37 comments)
